encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: Use vestig instead of traces; insert space before προσέχοντα; correct the breathing on ἐις; regularize <:παρατηρήσῃ|reg|παρατηρήσει:>, add supralines to the nomina sacra and punctuate r.3; dot alpha in εἱλασμος and regularize <:ἱλασμός|reg|ε ἱ(¨)λασμός:>; dot nu in ἐστιν; use *dotted-obelos* instead of *slanting-stroke*; dot mu in ὀνόματος; insert space before ὑπέμει̣[ν]ά and dot epsilon; insert *high-punctus* in v.3 after 3.- [το]ῦ̣· and in v.5 after ἐδεήθην; dot eta in τὴν v.5; . META: add remark that verso is upside down relative to recto; biblio 10946 should be 58234; add generic descr. to biblio 18263; found in 1905, Hermopolis is Pleiades georef (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/756574); Hermopolites is Pleiades georef (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/756575).

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: Use vestig instead of traces; insert space before προσέχοντα; correct the breathing on ἐις; regularize <:παρατηρήσῃ|reg|παρατηρήσει:>, add supralines to the nomina sacra and punctuate r.3; dot alpha in εἱλασμος and regularize <:ἱλασμός|reg|ε ἱ(¨)λασμός:>; dot nu in ἐστιν; use *dotted-obelos* instead of *slanting-stroke*; dot mu in ὀνόματος; insert space before ὑπέμει̣[ν]ά and dot epsilon; insert *high-punctus* in v.3 after 3.- [το]ῦ̣· and in v.5 after ἐδεήθην; dot eta in τὴν v.5; . META: add remark that verso is upside down relative to recto; biblio 10946 should be 58234; add generic descr. to biblio 18263; found in 1905, Hermopolis is Pleiades georef (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/756574); Hermopolites is Pleiades georef (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/756575).
Submit - Updated Metadata and added text as part of the Heidelberg digital papyrology webinar summer 2020
